mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carrel 5-5, south wall
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lee, Jenny [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Doodle (represented in transcription as [ ]) identified as a "penis wizard," with responses (note the theme of wizards in previous photo of series). Expression of love for the work of Argentine writer Jorge Luis Borges. The name of author and poet Jack Kerouac (seen elsewhere in this carrel as well). [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
[ ] | ↑ WTF is this a penis wizard! | how original | ♥Borges♥ | Jack Kerouac
